Field.Description: Throwing side character ID
Recipient character ID
Do not throw unless the distance is closer than this value [m]

Field.DisplayName: Angle difference range between your own direction and the direction of the other party min
Field.Description: If the angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side is not larger than this angle, it will not be thrown.

Field.DisplayName: Angle difference range between your own direction and the direction of the other party max
Field.Description: If the angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side is smaller than this angle, it will not be thrown.
Do not throw unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value
Do not throw unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value

Field.DisplayName: Angle difference between your own direction and the direction from yourself to the other party
Field.Description: The angle difference between the vector in front of you and the vector in the direction from you to the other party. If it is larger than this value, it will not be thrown
ID that identifies the type of throw (association with attack parameter)

Does the throwing side turn?

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to skip the weapon category check?
Field.Description: Do you want to skip the attacker's weapon category check?

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to skip the sphere cast?
Field.Description: Do you want to skip the sphere cast?

Field.DisplayName: Whether to return to the positional relationship equivalent to flat ground at the time of throwing adsorption
Field.Description: If it is set to ◯, the location of the throwing position will be the "position of the adsorption Damipoli that has returned to the positional relationship equivalent to the flat ground".

Field.DisplayName: Do you prevent the fall when the throwing follow is released?
Field.Description: Is the same treatment as the wall removal prevention applied to the fall prevention wall so that it does not fall from the step when the follow-up is released?

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to prevent the wall from digging in while following the throw?
Field.Description: Do you want to return the character with the Adsorbed Damipoli when it comes in contact with a hit or fall prevention wall so that it does not look like it will get stuck in the middle wall or fall from a step?
pad
Where on the throwing side should the receiving side be attracted?
Where on the receiving side should the throwing side be adsorbed?
Only throw at a distance closer than this value [m] Used for throwing at the start of the back stub

Field.DisplayName: Angle difference range between your own direction and the other's direction min (start throwing)
Field.Description: If the angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side is not larger than this angle, it will not be thrown. It is used for throwing at the start of the back stub.

Field.DisplayName: Angle difference range between your own direction and the opponent's direction max (start throwing)
Field.Description: The angle difference (Y-axis) between the throwing side and the receiving side must be smaller than this angle to throw. Used for throwing at the start of the back stub.
It will not be thrown unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value. It is used for throwing at the start of the back stub.
It will not be thrown unless the relative distance of the Y axis from the throwing side to the receiving side is smaller than this value. It is used for throwing at the start of the back stub.

Field.DisplayName: Angle difference between your own direction and the direction from yourself to the opponent (start throwing)
Field.Description: The angle difference between the vector in front of you and the vector in the direction from you to the other party. If it is larger than this value, it will not be thrown. It will be used for throwing at the start of the back stub.

Field.DisplayName: Throwing range judgment criteria on the throwing side Damipoli Id
Field.Description: Damipoli that the thrower considers to be his position when calculating the throw range. If -1, the capsule origin

Field.DisplayName: Criteria for throwing range on the thrown side Damipoli Id
Field.Description: Damipoli that the thrower considers to be his position when calculating the throw range. If -1, the capsule origin

Field.DisplayName: Model position interpolation time during adsorption [s]
Field.Description: After the capsule is adsorbed on Damipoli, the time it takes for the character model to interpolate and move to the position according to the throwing animation data (when 0 is set, the model position is not interpolated and playback starts immediately after adsorption with the positional relationship according to the animation data. Will be)

Field.DisplayName: Model position interpolation time at the end of tracking [s]
Field.Description: Model position interpolation time at the end of tracking
